Mad Hippie Vitamin C Toning Mist

Brand: Mad Hippie

Category: Toners/Astringents

Ingredients: Water (Aqua), Vitamin C (Sodium Ascorbyl Phosphate), Sodium PCA, Glycerin, Polyglutamic Acid, White Tea (Camellia Sinensis Extract), Tremella Fuciformis Polysaccharide, Ferulic Acid, Green Tea (Camellia Sinensis Leaf Extract), Hesperidin, Grape Seed Extr

din, Grape Seed Extract (Vitis Vinifera), Ginkgo Biloba Extract, Pomegranate (Punica Granatum Seed Extract), Resveratrol, Phenethyl Alcohol, Steam Distilled Citrus Aurantifolia (Lime) Extract, Sorbitan Oleate Decylglucoside Crosspolymer, Caprylyl Glycol, Beta-glucan, N-acetyl D Glucosamine, Ethylhexyl Glycerin, Pinus Stobus (White Pine) Bark Extrac

te Pine) Bark Extract, Glycine Soja (Soybean) Sterols, Sophora Japonica Fruit Extract, Milk Thistle (Silybum Marianum Fruit Extract), Alpha Lipoic Acid

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity, Use Restrictions; MODERATE: Cancer; LOW: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity
